name: Jet Drive
description:
Welcome to Jet Drive, Hell is empty, all ZOMBIES are here ! Can you escape from the city of zombies?
Make use of the car, the rocket and the jet boost to speed up. Fly over the zombies and find a way to the airport, where you can find a plane to leave this hell.

GAME FEATURES:
Enjoy the accelerating of the rocket and the car. Press the button at the right time to boost your rush.
Hat Skin: Collecting different hats and dress your role!
Pre-register prize: Pre-register to get the special skin!

More Features will be released later:
Vehicle upgrade: If you upgrade your car, the outlook of the car will also evolve.
More Details: More animates and effects will be added......

Learn more about the game!
Facebook :https://www.facebook.com/Jet-Drive-2873925915967770/
